name: green-scarf
effect: Held: Increases the holder’s Smartness during a Super Contest’s Visual Competition.
short_effect: Raises the holder’s Smartness while in a contest.

flavor_text.black_white: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Smart aspect of the holder in a Contest.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts the Smart aspect of the holder in a Contest.
